item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Empty Cargo Handling Equipment Only

numlitem.para: Procedures are established and used to verify lower cargo compartments remain empty, or contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits, and

For Combi, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Lower cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard adjacent or on fire control module located on the pilots overhead panel: "LOWER CARGO COMP FIRE EXT SYST INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
